channel.title: CVE Feed for ManageEngine -- ADSelfService Plus

item.title: CVE-2024-27310|2024-10-07T19:44:05.359Z -- manageengine -- adselfservice%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus versions below 6401 are vulnerable to the DOS attack due to the malicious LDAP input.

item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus versions below 6401 are vulnerable to the DOS attack due to the malicious LDAP query.
